<Link id="l00071" /><CodeLine lineNumber="71"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// These are flags that the value mapping APIs allow.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00072" /><CodeLine lineNumber="72" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a77724415203930efd07d7098cb1e437d"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">enum</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a77724415203930efd07d7098cb1e437d">RemapFlags</a> &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00074" /><CodeLine lineNumber="74"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00075" /><CodeLine lineNumber="75"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// If this flag is set, the remapper knows that only local values within a</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00076" /><CodeLine lineNumber="76"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// function (such as an instruction or argument) are mapped, not global</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00077" /><CodeLine lineNumber="77"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// values like functions and global metadata.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00078" /><CodeLine lineNumber="78" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a77724415203930efd07d7098cb1e437da9a24bd8dba1bef2753bc3f087435ae7f"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a77724415203930efd07d7098cb1e437da9a24bd8dba1bef2753bc3f087435ae7f">RF&#95;NoModuleLevelChanges</a> = 1,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00079" /><CodeLine lineNumber="79"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00080" /><CodeLine lineNumber="80"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// If this flag is set, the remapper ignores missing function-local entries</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00081" /><CodeLine lineNumber="81"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// (Argument, Instruction, BasicBlock) that are not in the value map.  If it</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00082" /><CodeLine lineNumber="82"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// is unset, it aborts if an operand is asked to be remapped which doesn&#39;t</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00083" /><CodeLine lineNumber="83"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// exist in the mapping.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00084" /><CodeLine lineNumber="84"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00085" /><CodeLine lineNumber="85"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// There are no such assertions in MapValue(), whose results are almost</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00086" /><CodeLine lineNumber="86"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// unchanged by this flag.  This flag mainly changes the assertion behaviour</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00087" /><CodeLine lineNumber="87"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// in RemapInstruction().</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00088" /><CodeLine lineNumber="88"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00089" /><CodeLine lineNumber="89"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Since an Instruction&#39;s metadata operands (even that point to SSA values)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00090" /><CodeLine lineNumber="90"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// aren&#39;t guaranteed to be dominated by their definitions, MapMetadata will</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00091" /><CodeLine lineNumber="91"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// return &quot;!&#123;&#125;&quot; instead of &quot;null&quot; for \\a LocalAsMetadata instances whose SSA</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00092" /><CodeLine lineNumber="92"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// values are unmapped when this flag is set.  Otherwise, \\a MapValue()</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00093" /><CodeLine lineNumber="93"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// completely ignores this flag.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00094" /><CodeLine lineNumber="94"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00095" /><CodeLine lineNumber="95"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// \\a MapMetadata() always ignores this flag.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00096" /><CodeLine lineNumber="96" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a77724415203930efd07d7098cb1e437da5633028bc27ffa8eab39cc5de65b3108"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a77724415203930efd07d7098cb1e437da5633028bc27ffa8eab39cc5de65b3108">RF&#95;IgnoreMissingLocals</a> = 2,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00097" /><CodeLine lineNumber="97"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00098" /><CodeLine lineNumber="98"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Instruct the remapper to reuse and mutate distinct metadata (remapping</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00099" /><CodeLine lineNumber="99"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// them in place) instead of cloning remapped copies. This flag has no</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00100" /><CodeLine lineNumber="100"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// effect when RF&#95;NoModuleLevelChanges, since that implies an identity</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00101" /><CodeLine lineNumber="101"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// mapping.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00102" /><CodeLine lineNumber="102" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a77724415203930efd07d7098cb1e437daf12b9f177771079708cf153bd90ec72b"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a77724415203930efd07d7098cb1e437daf12b9f177771079708cf153bd90ec72b">RF&#95;ReuseAndMutateDistinctMDs</a> = 4,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00103" /><CodeLine lineNumber="103"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00104" /><CodeLine lineNumber="104"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Any global values not in value map are mapped to null instead of mapping</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00111" /><CodeLine lineNumber="111"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00112" /><CodeLine lineNumber="112"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00113" /><CodeLine lineNumber="113"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Context for (re-)mapping values (and metadata).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00114" /><CodeLine lineNumber="114"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00115" /><CodeLine lineNumber="115"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// A shared context used for mapping and remapping of Value and Metadata</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00116" /><CodeLine lineNumber="116"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// instances using \\a ValueToValueMapTy, \\a RemapFlags, \\a</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00117" /><CodeLine lineNumber="117"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// ValueMapTypeRemapper, \\a ValueMaterializer, and \\a IdentityMD.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00118" /><CodeLine lineNumber="118"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00119" /><CodeLine lineNumber="119"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// There are a number of top-level entry points:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00120" /><CodeLine lineNumber="120"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// - \\a mapValue() (and \\a mapConstant());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00121" /><CodeLine lineNumber="121"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// - \\a mapMetadata() (and \\a mapMDNode());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00122" /><CodeLine lineNumber="122"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// - \\a remapInstruction();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00123" /><CodeLine lineNumber="123"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// - \\a remapFunction(); and</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00124" /><CodeLine lineNumber="124"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// - \\a remapGlobalObjectMetadata().</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00125" /><CodeLine lineNumber="125"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00126" /><CodeLine lineNumber="126"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// The \\a ValueMaterializer can be used as a callback, but cannot invoke any</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00127" /><CodeLine lineNumber="127"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// of these top-level functions recursively.  Instead, callbacks should use</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00128" /><CodeLine lineNumber="128"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// one of the following to schedule work lazily in the \\a ValueMapper</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00129" /><CodeLine lineNumber="129"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// instance:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00130" /><CodeLine lineNumber="130"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// - \\a scheduleMapGlobalInitializer()</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00131" /><CodeLine lineNumber="131"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// - \\a scheduleMapAppendingVariable()</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00132" /><CodeLine lineNumber="132"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// - \\a scheduleMapGlobalAlias()</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00133" /><CodeLine lineNumber="133"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// - \\a scheduleMapGlobalIFunc()</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00134" /><CodeLine lineNumber="134"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// - \\a scheduleRemapFunction()</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00135" /><CodeLine lineNumber="135"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00136" /><CodeLine lineNumber="136"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Sometimes a callback needs a different mapping context.  Such a context can</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00137" /><CodeLine lineNumber="137"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// be registered using \\a registerAlternateMappingContext(), which takes an</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00138" /><CodeLine lineNumber="138"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// alternate \\a ValueToValueMapTy and \\a ValueMaterializer and returns a ID to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00139" /><CodeLine lineNumber="139"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// pass into the schedule&#42;() functions.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00140" /><CodeLine lineNumber="140"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00141" /><CodeLine lineNumber="141"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// If an \\a IdentityMD set is optionally provided, \\a Metadata inside this set</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00142" /><CodeLine lineNumber="142"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// will be mapped onto itself in \\a VM on first use.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00143" /><CodeLine lineNumber="143"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00144" /><CodeLine lineNumber="144"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// TODO: lib/Linker really doesn&#39;t need the \\a ValueHandle in the \\a</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00145" /><CodeLine lineNumber="145"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// ValueToValueMapTy.  We should template \\a ValueMapper (and its</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00146" /><CodeLine lineNumber="146"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// implementation classes), and explicitly instantiate on two concrete</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00147" /><CodeLine lineNumber="147"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// instances of \\a ValueMap (one as \\a ValueToValueMap, and one with raw \\a</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00148" /><CodeLine lineNumber="148"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Value pointers).  It may be viable to do away with \\a TrackingMDRef in the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00149" /><CodeLine lineNumber="149"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// \\a Metadata side map for the lib/Linker case as well, in which case we&#39;ll</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00150" /><CodeLine lineNumber="150"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// need a new template parameter on \\a ValueMap.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00151" /><CodeLine lineNumber="151"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00152" /><CodeLine lineNumber="152"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// TODO: Update callers of \\a RemapInstruction() and \\a MapValue() (etc.) to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00153" /><CodeLine lineNumber="153"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// use \\a ValueMapper directly.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00154" /><CodeLine lineNumber="154" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/valuemapper"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">class </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/valuemapper/#ad0c8b397f8b38de86898f8ad1a2f7ca5">ValueMapper</a> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00155" /><CodeLine lineNumber="155"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;pImpl;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00206" /><CodeLine lineNumber="206"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00207" /><CodeLine lineNumber="207"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Look up or compute a value in the value map.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00208" /><CodeLine lineNumber="208"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00209" /><CodeLine lineNumber="209"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Return a mapped value for a function-local value (Argument, Instruction,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00210" /><CodeLine lineNumber="210"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// BasicBlock), or compute and memoize a value for a Constant.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00211" /><CodeLine lineNumber="211"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00212" /><CodeLine lineNumber="212"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///  1 If \\c V is in VM, return the result.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00213" /><CodeLine lineNumber="213"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///  2 Else if \\c V can be materialized with \\c Materializer, do so, memoize</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00214" /><CodeLine lineNumber="214"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///     it in \\c VM, and return it.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00215" /><CodeLine lineNumber="215"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///  3 Else if \\c V is a function-local value, return nullptr.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00216" /><CodeLine lineNumber="216"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///  4 Else if \\c V is a \\a GlobalValue, return \\c nullptr or \\c V depending</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00217" /><CodeLine lineNumber="217"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///     on \\a RF&#95;NullMapMissingGlobalValues.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00218" /><CodeLine lineNumber="218"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///  5 Else if \\c V is a \\a MetadataAsValue wrapping a LocalAsMetadata,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00219" /><CodeLine lineNumber="219"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///     recurse on the local SSA value, and return nullptr or &quot;metadata !&#123;&#125;&quot; on</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00220" /><CodeLine lineNumber="220"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///     missing depending on RF&#95;IgnoreMissingValues.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00221" /><CodeLine lineNumber="221"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///  6 Else if \\c V is a \\a MetadataAsValue, rewrap the return of \\a</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00222" /><CodeLine lineNumber="222"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///     MapMetadata().</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00223" /><CodeLine lineNumber="223"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///  7 Else, compute the equivalent constant, and return it.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00224" /><CodeLine lineNumber="224" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7d7375d2149eafc730d09e8e48089021"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">inline</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7d7375d2149eafc730d09e8e48089021">MapValue</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;V, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#abf0f52ae29f87b5e0f2b95ff961cdae1">ValueToValueMapTy</a> &amp;VM,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00225" /><CodeLine lineNumber="225"><span class="doxyHighlight">                       <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a77724415203930efd07d7098cb1e437d">RemapFlags</a> Flags = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a77724415203930efd07d7098cb1e437da89b60f3b4ad8c1e0ddb9a31b57cb13f9">RF&#95;None</a>,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00226" /><CodeLine lineNumber="226"><span class="doxyHighlight">                       <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/valuemaptyperemapper">ValueMapTypeRemapper</a> &#42;TypeMapper = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">,</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00233" /><CodeLine lineNumber="233"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Lookup or compute a mapping for a piece of metadata.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00234" /><CodeLine lineNumber="234"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00235" /><CodeLine lineNumber="235"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Compute and memoize a mapping for \\c MD.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00236" /><CodeLine lineNumber="236"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00237" /><CodeLine lineNumber="237"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///  1 If \\c MD is mapped, return it.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00238" /><CodeLine lineNumber="238"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///  2 Else if \\a RF&#95;NoModuleLevelChanges or \\c MD is an \\a MDString, return</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00239" /><CodeLine lineNumber="239"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///     \\c MD.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00240" /><CodeLine lineNumber="240"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///  3 Else if \\c MD is a \\a ConstantAsMetadata, call \\a MapValue() and</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00241" /><CodeLine lineNumber="241"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///     re-wrap its return (returning nullptr on nullptr).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00242" /><CodeLine lineNumber="242"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///  4 Else if \\c MD is in \\c IdentityMD then add an identity mapping for it</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00243" /><CodeLine lineNumber="243"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///     and return it.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00244" /><CodeLine lineNumber="244"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///  5 Else, \\c MD is an \\a MDNode.  These are remapped, along with their</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00245" /><CodeLine lineNumber="245"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///     transitive operands.  Distinct nodes are duplicated or moved depending</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00246" /><CodeLine lineNumber="246"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///     on \\a RF&#95;MoveDistinctNodes.  Uniqued nodes are remapped like constants.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00247" /><CodeLine lineNumber="247"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00248" /><CodeLine lineNumber="248"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// \\note \\a LocalAsMetadata is completely unsupported by \\a MapMetadata.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00249" /><CodeLine lineNumber="249"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Instead, use \\a MapValue() with its wrapping \\a MetadataAsValue instance.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00311" /><CodeLine lineNumber="311"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00312" /><CodeLine lineNumber="312"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Calls \\a MapValue() on prefix data, prologue data, and personality</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00313" /><CodeLine lineNumber="313"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// function; calls \\a MapMetadata() on each attached MDNode; remaps the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00314" /><CodeLine lineNumber="314"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// argument types using the provided \\c TypeMapper; and calls \\a</span></CodeLine>
